item.title: PC requirements
item.description: In order to use the teleoperation application, your PC needs to support Virtual Reality and SteamVR. It is required for the computer to run on Windows, to be powerful enough and equipped with a graphic card. The computer minimum requirements are the following: Operating System: Windows 10 (or Windows 7 SP1) Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 8GB RAM Graphic card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Network: Broadband Internet connection.

item.title: Compatible headsets
item.description: The VR teleoperation application is compatible with the following device: Valve Index HTC Vive Oculus Rift It is also compatible with Oculus Quest 1 & 2 using an Oculus Link cable to connect it to your computer or Virtual Desktop application.
